Layering:22¬∞C and above: T-shirt12-21¬∞C: T-shirt + thin fleece layer / pullover / hoodie5-12¬∞C: T-shirt + thin fleece + light synthetic jacketBelow 5¬∞C: Uniqlo heat tech + T-shirt + thin fleece + light synthetic jacketNo layering:22¬∞C and above: T-shirt0-21¬∞C: T-shirt + high-fill down jacketBelow freezing: Heat tech + T-shirt + down jacketThe concept of layering is to allow you to feel more comfortable as the temperatures get colder/warmer throughout the day  or as you transition indoors/outdoors. For example if the temperature's at 15¬∞C  you might feel too cold with just a t-shirt  but also too warm with a high-fill down jacket.
